hits.author: Austin_Conlon
hits.comment_text:
Software engineer for Apple platforms (iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS)

Location: Mountain View, CA

Technologies: Objective-C, Swift, SwiftUI

App Store apps: https://apps.apple.com/developer/austin-conlon/id1189508961

GitHub: https://github.com/AustinConlon

Email/iMessage: austinconlon@icloud.com

Preference is for freelance or contract work.

Rate is 120%-140% of the market U.S. rate of a full time mobile developer (https://insights.stackoverflow.com/survey/2020#work-salary-b...) to account for the overhead of contracting.
hits.story_title: Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (July 2021)

hits.author: bolt28
hits.comment_text:
Bolt | Software Engineering | https://www.bolt.com

Commerce is moving online faster than ever, and our Engineering team (ex FB/Google/Twitter/Uber) cannot build fast enough to meet demand. We need Front End, Mobile, and Senior Software Engineers for our 2021 goals.

If up for it, connect with us over a 10min zoom coffee next week to share more: sam.greinetz@bolt.com

hits.author: joshingmachine
hits.comment_text:
Niche | Pittsburgh, PA | Full-time | Onsite and Remote (USA only) | https://www.niche.com/

Niche is the leader in school search. Our mission is to make researching and enrolling in schools easy, transparent, and free. With in-depth profiles on every school and college in America, 140 million reviews and ratings, and powerful search tools, we help millions of people find the right school for them. We also help thousands of schools recruit more best-fit students, by highlighting what makes them great and making it easier to visit and apply.

Senior Mobile Engineer https://boards.greenhouse.io/nichecom/jobs/4032911004

Software Engineer, Front-End https://grnh.se/875c78f24us

Software Engineer, Back-End https://grnh.se/04218d544us

Sr. UI/UX Designer https://grnh.se/110e92594us

Data Engineer https://grnh.se/f36aa2d14us

Scrum Master/Software Development Project Manager https://boards.greenhouse.io/nichecom/jobs/4032902004

Sr. Quality Assurance Analyst https://boards.greenhouse.io/nichecom/jobs/4038702004
